definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[דרג]] (√ of foll. cf. Ar. daraja go on foot, step by step, walk, darija rise in grade, rank; NH [[דרג]] Hiph. raise, make high; Eth. drg: is be connected; Aram. dareg (verb denom. acc. to PS); also As. darâgu, be high, lift, Lyon:Sargontexte 80, durgu, daragu, path, way (of steep mountain paths) COT:Gloss (cf. also [[דרך]]); Ar. darajah;un a step, stair, Aram. [[דַּרְגׇּא]], dreg, dargo0, id.)
